meta.job_title: Registered Nurse, Peds CCVCU, Night Shift

duties_responsibilities.duty: Carry out patient care responsibilities using the nursing process, including assessment, diagnosis, planning, implementation, and evaluation.
Formulate initial plan of care with the physician/nurse practitioner and collaborate to implement a comprehensive patient-centered plan of care.
Analyze unit level quality data and participate in improvement efforts to achieve organizational goals within the quality and safety performance improvement plan.
Direct patient/family and interdisciplinary team to identify a plan of care and outcomes that are realistic and measurable.
Educate the patient/family regarding health status and established plan of care.
Evaluate patient's progress towards expected outcomes and modify interventions as needed.
Coordinate and direct unit activities to provide patient care in a healing, humane, and caring environment.
Organize staff assignments to ensure appropriate delegation of activities.
Serve as a support, resource, and preceptor for nursing staff and students.
Adhere to patient care and nursing standards, and use clinical practice guidelines.
Participate in standard development and practice evaluation.

education_certification.credential: Current Registered Professional Nurse in New York, Bachelors degree in Nursing required, Basic Life Support Certification through the American Heart Association, Fluent written and spoken English language skills.
